ai-iti50:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti50:2.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these three unskillful roots.
ai-iti50:2.4_0: These are the three unskillful roots. ”
ai-iti50:2.5_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti50:3.3_0: Destroy the person with bad thoughts,
ai-iti50:3.4_0: as a reed is destroyed by its own fruit.”
ai-iti50:4.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
